overview:
## Discussion

Use this property for additional data as may be appropriate for your app—for example, a shopping cart identifier or an order number.

A hash of this data is included in the signed payment data (the [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentToken/paymentData] property of [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentToken]). You are responsible for sending the full application data to your server, if needed.

# applicationData

**Instance Property**

Application-specific data or state.

## Declaration

```swift
var applicationData: Data? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property for additional data as may be appropriate for your app—for example, a shopping cart identifier or an order number.

A hash of this data is included in the signed payment data (the [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentToken/paymentData] property of [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentToken]). You are responsible for sending the full application data to your server, if needed.
title: applicationData
